metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text:
o Blend peppers, walnuts, breadcrumbs, minced garlic, olive oil, pomegranate 
molasses, cumin, and salt in a food processor until smooth. Msemen 
 
Ingredients: 
o 2 cups flour 
o 1 cup semolina 
o 1 teaspoon salt 
o 1/4 cup olive oil 
o 1 cup water 
o 1/4 cup butter 
 
Instructions: 
o Mix flour, semolina, and salt in a bowl. Muhammara 
 
Ingredients: 
o 2 red bell peppers 
o 1/2 cup walnuts 
o 1/4 cup breadcrumbs 
o 2 cloves garlic 
o 1/4 cup olive oil 
o 1 tablespoon pomegranate molasses 
o 1 teaspoon cumin 
o 1 teaspoon salt 
 
Instructions: 
o Roast bell peppers until charred, then peel and seed. Mutabal 
 
Ingredients: 
o 2 eggplants 
o 1/4 cup tahini 
o 1/4 cup lemon juice 
o 2 cloves garlic 
o 1/4 cup olive oil 
o 1 teaspoon salt 
 
Instructions: 
o Roast eggplants until soft, then peel and mash. o Divide dough into balls and roll out into thin circles.

o Blend chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, minced garlic, and salt in a food processor. Hummus 
 
Ingredients: 
o 1 can chickpeas 
o 1/4 cup tahini 
o 1/4 cup lemon juice 
o 2 cloves garlic 
o 1/4 cup olive oil 
o 1 teaspoon salt 
 
Instructions: 
o Drain and rinse chickpeas. Japchae 
 
Ingredients: 
o 8 ounces sweet potato noodles 
o 1/2 pound beef 
o 1 small onion 
o 1 carrot 
o 1 bell pepper 
o 1 cup spinach 
o 2 tablespoons soy sauce 
o 1 tablespoon sesame oil 
o 1 tablespoon sugar 
o 1 tablespoon sesame seeds 
 
Instructions: 
o Cook noodles according to package instructions, then drain. Jerk Vegetables 
 
Ingredients: 
o 1 cup broccoli 
o 1 cup bell peppers 
o 1 cup zucchini 
o 1 small onion 
o 2 cloves garlic 
o 2 tablespoons jerk seasoning. o Sauté sliced beef, diced onion, julienned carrot, and bell pepper in sesame oil 
until cooked.

Chicken Caesar Wrap 
Ingredients: 
• 
1 whole wheat tortilla 
• 
1 cup cooked chicken breast, sliced 
• 
1 cup romaine lettuce, chopped 
• 
2 tablespoons Caesar dressing 
• 
2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese 
• 
Optional: croutons for extra crunch 
Instructions: 
• 
Lay the tortilla flat and spread the Caesar dressing evenly. Quinoa Salad 
Ingredients: 
• 
1 cup cooked quinoa 
• 
1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, halved 
• 
1/2 cucumber, diced 
• 
1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped 
• 
1/4 cup feta cheese, crumbled 
• 
2 tablespoons olive oil 
• 
1 tablespoon lemon juice 
• 
Salt and pepper to taste 
Instructions: 
• 
In a large bowl, combine the quinoa, tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and feta cheese. Turkey and Avocado Sandwich 
Ingredients: 
• 
2 slices whole grain bread 
• 
4 slices turkey breast 
• 
1/2 avocado, sliced 
• 
1/2 cup spinach leaves 
• 
1 tablespoon mustard or mayo 
Instructions: 
• 
Spread mustard or mayo on one slice of bread. • 
Top with the second slice of bread and cut in half. • 
Roll up the tortilla tightly and slice in half.

Greek Yogurt Parfait 
Ingredients: 
• 
1 cup Greek yogurt 
• 
1/2 cup granola 
• 
1/2 cup mixed berries (strawberries, blueberries, raspberries) 
• 
1 tablespoon honey 
Instructions: 
• 
In a bowl or jar, layer the Greek yogurt, granola, and mixed berries. Hummus and Veggie Pita 
Ingredients: 
• 
1 whole wheat pita bread 
• 
1/2 cup hummus 
• 
1/2 cup cucumber, sliced 
• 
1/2 cup bell pepper, sliced 
• 
1/4 cup shredded carrots 
• 
1/4 cup baby spinach 
Instructions: 
• 
Cut the pita bread in half to create pockets. Tuna Salad 
Ingredients: 
• 
1 can tuna, drained 
• 
1/4 cup mayonnaise 
• 
1 tablespoon Dijon mustard 
• 
1 celery stalk, diced 
• 
1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped 
• 
Salt and pepper to taste 
• 
Lettuce leaves or whole grain bread for serving 
Instructions: 
• 
In a bowl, combine the tuna, mayonnaise, Dijon mustard, celery, and red onion. • 
Fill with cucumber, bell pepper, carrots, and spinach. • 
Repeat the layers if desired.

Chicken and Veggie Stir-Fry 
Ingredients: 
• 
1 cup cooked chicken breast, sliced 
• 
1/2 cup bell pepper, sliced 
• 
1/2 cup broccoli florets 
• 
1/4 cup snap peas 
• 
2 tablespoons soy sauce 
• 
1 tablespoon olive oil 
• 
1 teaspoon sesame oil 
• 
Cooked rice for serving 
Instructions: 
• 
In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Shrimp and Avocado Salad 
Ingredients: 
• 
1 cup cooked shrimp, peeled and deveined 
• 
1/2 avocado, diced 
• 
1/4 cup cherry tomatoes, halved 
• 
1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped 
• 
2 tablespoons olive oil 
• 
1 tablespoon lemon juice 
• 
Salt and pepper to taste 
Instructions: 
• 
In a bowl, combine the shrimp, avocado, tomatoes, and red onion. Black Bean and Corn Salad 
Ingredients: 
• 
1 can black beans, drained and rinsed 
• 
1 cup corn kernels (fresh or canned) 
• 
1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, halved. • 
Add bell pepper, broccoli, and snap peas, and stir-fry until tender. • 
Add the cooked chicken and soy sauce, and stir to combine.
